author: remm
msg: - Fix bad test using isFile. Somehow, this doesn't seem to follow what is in the javadocs, and returns false all the time, so support
for packed WARs was broken. !isDirectory is now used instead.
- When parsing a context file, ignore the "path" attribute. The only place where it is acceptable is in server.xml.

author: remm
msg: - Docs updates, mostly to the connectors page.
